header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: ANON’s school filming trip, warm enough at night, ANON’s hurting leg, going to the gym, running machines, doughnuts

what did you do? did you fall down the stairs like I did?
no I've just got sore legs because I went to the gym this morning
do you know I sat in the car because what I have had happen to me many a time is I've got there at like six twenty-five

and it's dark and it's cold and they won't open the door until six thirty and there's nothing more miserable than standing outside the gym waiting for it to open so I timed it perfectly so I was there at six thirty and people were already in the gym and I was like oh who are these people and why are they allowed in there early?
but I was the first person on one of the running machines
so that's okay but they forgot to put the music on this morning it was really weird so everyone was silent apart from this silly grunty man on the weights

oh no I do have my music we all have our own music but there's also music you know in the background which is quite nice cos when you take your own music off it's just like completely silent and it's really weird and unnatural very odd indeed
do you know though I often on the running machine you get a little television so you'd love that

erm and you there wasn't I went onto the music channel but because it's so early in the morning they just have adverts and I kept thinking of you because they were they these are the adverts where they kind of keep selling the same product for about an hour
oh god no I don't like that
no no but there was a special erm cleaner which cleaned the surfaces of

of either the floor or work surfaces and it was like a mini vacuum cleaner but it was like a mini steam cleaner so with a tiny nozzle that did like hot water an and I just thought oh my god you would love that
and then I thought gosh I really do need to get the carpets steam cleaned in this house because they're horrible

there you go cleaning products for 's birthday I'm not getting you cleaning products
